alert.note: Alert for Meade (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 07 at 2:54PM CDT until July 08 at 2:30AM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Dodge City KS has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Kansas... Cimarron River Near Forgan 8NNE affecting Meade County. For the Cimarron River...including Forgan 8NNE...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO JUST AFTER MIDNIGHT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Cimarron River Near Forgan 8NNE. * WHEN...From this afternoon to just after midnight tonight. * IMPACTS...At 5.0 feet, Expect minor overflows of low lying banks along the Cimarron River in southern Meade County on downstream into Oklahoma. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:00 PM CDT Friday the stage was 5.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 5.3 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage this evening. - Flood stage is 5.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 5.4 feet on 09/19/1969. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
